relevant_findings.general: Lying in bed but able to sit up. Alert, oriented, in no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclerae anicteric, MMM, oropharynx clear, neck supple and without lymphadenopathy. PEERL.
relevant_findings.lungs: End inspiratory wheezes throughout, worse at the right base. No crackles or rales.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Irregularly irregular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mildly tender in RUQ, non-distended, hypoactive bowel sounds, no guarding or rebound tenderness. No organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, no clubbing or cyanosis. Mild nonpitting edema in lower extremities.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented. No gross deficits.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient reports improvement, with pain decreased to 1% and resolution of dysuria. No nausea or vomiting.
